text: The following is a list of deaths that should be noted in November 2018. For deaths that should be noted before the month that the world is in, please see "Months". Names under each date are noted in the order of the alphabet by last name or pseudonym. Deaths of non-humans are noted here also if it is worth noting. Each listing of a death must have a source. If no reference is included, the death notice will be removed. The following are the requirements of adding a name to the list in its order: name, age, where they came from, what the person is known for, cause of death (if known) and a source. ==November== ===1=== *Carlo Giuffrè, 89, Italian actor (The Railroad Man, The Girl with the Pistol, Poker in Bed) and stage director, cancer. E' morto Carlo Giuffrè, grande attore di teatro e di cinema *Theodor Hoffmann, 83, German admiral, Chief of the Volksmarine (1987–1989) and East Germany Minister of Defense (1989–1990).Früherer DDR-Verteidigungsminister gestorben *Mariano Rajoy Sobredo, 97, Spanish jurist and magistrate.Muere el padre de Mariano Rajoy a los 97 años *Ken Swofford, 85, American actor (Fame, Ellery Queen, The Andromeda Strain).Ken Swofford, Actor on 'Fame' and 'Ellery Queen,' Dies at 85 *Yurik Vardanyan, 62, Soviet-Armenian weightlifter, Olympic champion (1980), pulmonary embolism.Legendary Armenian weightlifter Yuri Vardanyan passes away in US ===2=== *Roger Bootle-Wilbraham, 7th Baron Skelmersdale, 73, British politician, member of the House of Lords (since 1974).Deaths of Members *Raymond Chow, 91, Hong Kong movie producer (Golden Harvest) and presenter.嘉禾创办人邹文怀去世 曾栽培李小龙成龙等巨星 *Roy Hargrove, 49, American jazz trumpeter ("With the Tenors of Our Time", "Habana", "Directions in Music: Live at Massey Hall"), Grammy winner (1997, 2002), heart attack.Roy Hargrove, Grammy-Winning Jazz Trumpeter, Dies At 49 *Maulana Sami-ul-Haq, 80, Pakistani cleric and politician, Senator (1985–1997, 2003–2009), stabbed. *Merete Skavlan, 98, Norwegian actress (The Long Christmas Dinner, The House of Bernarda Alba, The Bald Soprano) and editor (Dagbladet).Merete Skavlan death notice *Robert F. Taft, 86, American Jesuit priest, Archimandrite of the Ukrainian Greek Catholic Church (since 1963).Fr. Robert Taft, feisty ecumenist and liturgical historian, dies at 86 ===3=== *Janusz Bielański, 79, Polish Roman Catholic priest, Rector of the Wawel Cathedral (1983–2007).Odszedł do Pana ksiądz infułat Janusz Bielański *Mari Hulman George, 83, American motorsport executive (Indianapolis Motor Speedway). *John Large, 75, British consulting nuclear engineer (Friends of the Earth), heart attack.John Large obituary *Sondra Locke, 74, American actress (The Heart is a Lonely Hunter, The Outlaw Josey Wales, Sudden Impact), complications from breast and bone cancer.Clint Eastwood's ex-girlfriend, Oscar nominee Sondra Locke, dead at 74 ===4=== *Karl-Heinz Adler, 91, German artist.Dresdner Maler und Grafiker Karl-Heinz Adler gestorben *Manohar Prahlad Awati, 91, Indian Navy vice admiral, Commander of the National Defence Academy (1976–1978), complications from pneumonia.Indian Navy loses one of its heroes: Vice Admiral MP Awati passes away *Donna Axum, 76, American beauty pageant contestant and model, Miss America (1964), complications from Parkinson's disease.Arkansas' first Miss America, Donna Axum Whitworth, passes away *Tetsugen Bernard Glassman, 79, American Zen Buddhist monk, complications from a stroke.Bernie Glassman Passes Away *Marco Dezzi Bardeschi, 84, Italian architect, educator (Polytechnic University of Milan) and editor (ANANKE), throat cancer.Morto Marco Dezzi Bardeschi L’architettura dell’antirestauro *Sir Jeremy Heywood, 56, British economist and civil servant, Cabinet Secretary (2012–2018), lung cancer.Former Cabinet Secretary Sir Jeremy Heywood dies from cancer at 56 *Harris Hines, 75, American judge, Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Georgia (2017–2018), car crash.Former Chief Justice Harris Hines Dies in Car Accident, Says Court Spokeswoman *Richard Le Hir, 71, Canadian politician, member of the National Assembly of Quebec from Iberville (1994–1998), complications from a stroke.L’ancien ministre péquiste Richard Le Hir s'est éteint à l’âge de 71 ans *Vince Manuwai, 38, American football player (Jacksonville Jaguars), cardiac arrest.Former Hawaii football star Vince Manuwai dies at 38 *Grant R. Osborne, 76, American theologian.Grant Osborne *Wolfgang Zuckermann, 96, German-born American harpsichord maker and activist. (death announced on this date) ===5=== *Keith Christiansen, 74, Canadian-born American Hall of Fame ice hockey player (Minnesota Fighting Saints), Olympic silver medalist (1972), pneumonia complicated by lung cancer.Former Fighting Saint, UMD, Olympic star Keith Christiansen dies at 74 *Héctor Ferrer, 52, Puerto Rican politician, President of the Popular Democratic Party (2008–2011, 2017–2018) and member of the House of Representatives (2001–2018), esophageal cancer. ===6=== * Jonathan Cantwell, 36, Australian racing cyclist (DVP). *Bernard Landry, 81, Canadian politician, Premier of Quebec (2001–2003), complications from pulmonary fibrosis.Former Quebec premier Bernard Landry dead at 81 ===7=== *Ian David Long, 28, American mass murderer, perpetrator responsible for the Thousand Oaks shooting, shot.Gunman kills 12 in California bar *Francis Lai, 86, French movie score composer (A Man and a Woman, Rider on the Rain, Love Story), Oscar winner (1971).Mort du compositeur et musicien Francis Lai *Alan Watson, 85, British legal scholar.Remembering Professor Alan Watson (1933 - 2018) ===8=== *Harold Basch, 77, American-born Israeli chemist.פרופ' השי הרולד בש ז"ל Prof. Hashie Harold Basch *Bartolomé Bennassar, 89, French historian.Muere Bartolomé Bennassar, el historiador francés que mejor definió a Vallladolid *François N. Macerola, 76, Canadian lawyer and movie executive (National Film Board of Canada, Telefilm Canada).François Macerola s'éteint *Wallace Triplett, 92, American Hall of Fame football player (Detroit Lions, Chicago Cardinals), first African-American to be drafted in the NFL.Lions Legend Wally Triplett passes away at age 92 *Marvin Zuckerman, 90, American psychologist and writer (Personality and Individual Differences), cardiac arrest.In memoriam: Marvin Zuckerman ===9=== *Richard Paul Conaboy, 93, American judge, District Court Judge for the Middle District of Pennsylvania (1979–1992), complications from a heart attack. *Roger Hoy, 71, English footballer (Tottenham Hotspur, Crystal Palace, Cardiff).Former Player Roger Hoy Passes Away Aged 71 ===10=== *Raffaele Baldassarre, 62, Italian politician, MEP (2009–2014), heart attack.Un infarto stronca la vita all' On. Raffaele Baldassarre *Joel Barcellos, 81, Brazilian actor (Os Fuzis, My Home is Copacabana, Sagarana: The Duel), stroke.Morre aos 81 anos o ator Joel Barcellos *Ron Johnson, 71, American football player (New York Giants, Michigan Wolverines), complications from Alzheimer's disease.Former Wolverine All-American passes away *Herbert London, 79, American political activist and conservative commentator (The Washington Times), President of the Hudson Institute (1997–2011), complications from heart failure.Herb London, Conservative Thought Leader, Passes at 79 *Liz J. Patterson, 78, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from South Carolina's 4th congressional district (1987–1993).Former SC Rep. Liz Patterson dies ===11=== *D. J. Finney, 101, British statistician, Director of the Agricultural and Food Research Council (1954–1984) and member of the World Cultural Council (since 1981). *Olga Harmony, 90, Mexican playwright.Fallece la dramaturga y crítica teatral Olga Harmony *Wayne Maunder, 80, Canadian- born American actor (The Seven Minutes, Porky's, Lancer), heart attack. *Douglas Rain, 90, Canadian actor (2001: A Space Odyssey).Stratford Festival Founder Dies *Frankie Schneider, 92, American racing driver (NASCAR). ===12=== *Ananth Kumar, 59, Indian politician, Minister of Parliamentary Affairs (since 2016), Chemicals and Fertilizers (since 2014), Civil Aviation (1998–1999) and MP for Bangalore South (since 1996), lung cancer.Union minister Ananth Kumar dies at 59 *Stan Lee, 95, American comic book writer (Spider-Man, The Avengers, X-Men) and publisher (Marvel Comics), congestive cardiorespiratory failure.Stan Lee, Marvel Comics' Real-Life Superhero, Dies at 95 *Igor Luchenok, 80, Belarusian composer, People's Artist of the USSR, stroke.Умер народный артист Белоруссии и СССР Игорь Лученок *Fred Patten, 77, American novelist (Watching Anime, Reading Manga), anime writer (Tekkaman: The Space Knight) and editor (Doomed Megalopolis), aortic aneurysm.Fred Patten (1940-2018) *David Pearson, 83, American Hall of Fame racing driver (NASCAR).David Pearson, NASCAR's Silver Fox, has died at 83 *Stuart H. Walker, 95, American Olympic yachtsman (1968) and writer, stomach cancer. ===13=== *Lucho Gatica, 90, Chilean bolero singer ("Me Importas Tú", "Sinceridad") and actor (El secreto de la ouija), heart attack.Murió Lucho Gatica, un rey del bolero *Caroline Rose Hunt, 95, American businesswoman (Rosewood Hotels & Resorts) and philanthropist, stroke.Caroline Rose Hunt, mother of the Crescent and the Mansion, dies at 95 *Everett A. Kelly, 92, American politician, member of the Florida House of Representatives (1978–2000).Longtime state Rep. Everett A. Kelly dies at 92 *Katherine MacGregor, 93, American actress (Little House on the Prairie), congestive heart failure.La Petite Maison dans la prairie : Katherine MacGregor (Harriet Oleson) est décédée *William Mullan, 90, Scottish football referee (Scottish Football League First Division, UEFA, FIFA).Former top referee Bill Mullan dies aged 90 ===14=== *Morten Grunwald, 83, Danish actor (Olsen Gang) and director, thyroid cancer.Skuespilleren Morten Grunwald er dø *James V. Hansen, 86, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Utah's 1st congressional district (1981–2003).Jim Hansen, who served longer in the U.S. House than any Utahn, dies at age 86 *Rolf Hoppe, 87, German actor (I Was Nineteen, Magnat, Pestalozzi's Mountain). *Fernando del Paso, 83, Mexican novelist (José Trigo, Noticias del Imperio, Linda 67) and poet, member of the Colegio Nacional de México (since 1996).Comunidad Cultural Lamenta Muerte de Fernando del Paso ===15=== *John Bluthal, 89, Polish-born British-Australian actor (Never Mind the Quality, Feel the Width, The Vicar of Dibley, Hail, Caesar!).Vale: John Bluthal *Roy Clark, 85, American Hall of Fame country singer ("Yesterday When I Was Young") and television host (Hee Haw), member of the Grand Ole Opry (since 1987), complications from pneumonia.Country Star Roy Clark Dies at 85 *Adolf Grünbaum, 95, German-American science philosopher, Chair of the Center for Philosophy of Science (since 1978) and fellow of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences. *Zhores Medvedev, 93, Russian agronomist, biologist and dissident, heart attack.В Лондоне умер Жорес Медведев *Mike Noble, 88, British comic artist (Lone Ranger, TV Century 21) and cartoonist (Fireball XL5). *Luigi Rossi di Montelera, 72, Italian businessman (Martini & Rossi) and politician, Deputy (1976–1992), heart attack.È morto Luigi Rossi di Montelera, fu industrale e deputato *Aldyr Schlee, 83, Brazilian writer and illustrator, designer of football national team jersey.Morre Aldyr Schlee, escritor e criador da camisa amarela da seleção brasileira *Sigmund Steinnes, 59, Norwegian politician, MP (since 2013), pancreatic cancer.Sigmund Steinnes er død - 59 år gammel ===16=== *Scott English, 81, American songwriter ("Hi Ho Silver Lining", "Brandy", "Bend Me, Shape Me") and record producer. *Pablo Ferro, 83, Cuban-born American graphic movie title designer (Dr. Strangelove, A Clockwork Orange, Bullitt), complications from pneumonia.Pablo Ferro, Famed Title Designer on 'Dr. Strangelove,' 'Clockwork Orange' and 'Bullitt,' Dies at 83 *William Goldman, 87, American novelist (The Princess Bride) and screenwriter (Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid, All the President's Men), Oscar winner (1970, 1977), pneumonia complicated by colorectal cancer.William Goldman, Oscar-Winning Writer of ‘Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid,’ Dies at 87 *Hiromasa Yonekura, 81, Japanese businessman, President of Sumitomo Chemical (2000–2009). ===17=== *Richard Baker, 93, English broadcaster (BBC News, Start the Week, Melodies for You).Former BBC newsreader Richard Baker dies aged 93 *Gene Berce, 91, American basketball player (Oshkosh All-Stars, Tri-Cities Blackhawks), complications from a fall.Ex-Marquette basketball great Gene Berce has died at age 91 *Kayo Dottley, 90, American football player (Chicago Bears), complications from pneumonia.Ole Miss football icon Kayo Dottley passes away at 90 *Eduard von Falz-Fein, 106, Russian-born Liechtensteiner businessman, journalist and sportsman, fire.В Лихтенштейне скончался барон Эдуард фон Фальц-Фейн *Alyque Padamsee, 90, Indian actor (Gandhi), recipient of the Padma Shri (2000). ===18=== *Héctor Beltrán Leyva, 56, Mexican drug cartel leader (Beltrán-Leyva Cartel), heart attack.Muere Héctor Beltrán Leyva, el capo mexicano que inició al Chapo Guzmán en el tráfico de cocaína *Waldyr Boccardo, 82, Brazilian basketball player, World champion (1959) and Olympic bronze medalist (1960), pneumonia.Campeão mundial com a seleção em 1959, Waldir Boccardo morre aos 82 anos, no Rio de Janeiro *Eddie Reeves, 79, American songwriter ("All I Ever Need Is You") and record label executive (Warner Bros. Records), stroke.Songwriter, Recording Artist & Label Exec Eddie Reeves Dies *Muhammad Abdul Wahhab, 95, Pakistani Islamic cleric, Amir of Tablighi Jamaat (since 1992), complications from dengue fever.Tableeghi Jamaat Ameer Haji Abdul Wahab passes away *Uladzimir Zhuravel, 47, Belarusian football player (national team, Dinamo Minsk) and coach (Shakhtyor Soligorsk), cardiac arrest.Умер известный белорусский футболист и тренер Владимир Журавель ===19=== *Apisai Ielemia, 63, Tuvaluan politician, Prime Minister (2006 –2010).Former Tuvalu prime minister laid to rest *Alí Rodríguez Araque, 81, Venezuelan politician, Minister of Foreign Affairs (2004–2006) and Finance (2008–2010), heart attack. *Witold Sobociński, 89, Polish cinematographer (The Adventures of Gerard, The Hourglass Sanatorium, Frantic) and academic. ===20=== *Roy Bailey, 83, English folk singer- songwriter ("Songs of Life from a Dying British Empire", "Gentle Men") and guitarist, heart failure.Roy Bailey obituary *James H. Billington, 89, American academic, Librarian of Congress (1987–2015), pneumonia.James H. Billington, 89, Dies; Led Library of Congress Into Digital Age *Eddie C. Campbell, 79, American blues singer ("King of the Jungle", "Spider Eating Preacher") and guitarist, complications from a stroke. Eddie C. Campbell, a master of West Side blues, dies at 79 *Mac Collins, 74, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Georgia's 8th congressional district (1993–2005).Former U.S. Rep. Mac Collins, a GOP pioneer in Georgia, dies at 74 *Shlomo Erell, 98, Israeli military general, Commander of Israeli Navy (1966–1968).מפקד חיל הים לשעבר, שלמה אראל, הלך לעולמו בגיל 98 *Anvar Khamei, 101, Iranian sociologist, economist and journalist, respiratory failure.انور خامه‌ای درگذشت *Sir Aaron Klug, 92, Lithuanian-born British chemist and biophysicist, Nobel Prize winner (1982).Aaron Klug (1926 – 2018) *Eimuntas Nekrošius, 65, Lithuanian stage director (Kaunas State Drama Theatre) and actor (The Corridor), heart attack. ===21=== *Meena Alexander, 67, Indian-born American writer and scholar.Poet, essayist Meena Alexander dies at 67 *Michele Carey, 75, American actress (El Dorado, Live a Little, Love a Little, The Sweet Ride).Michele Carey Dies: ‘El Dorado’ And ‘Live A Little, Love A Little’ Actress Was 75 *Olivia Hooker, 103, American psychologist and military personel, first African-American woman in the U.S. Coast Guard and last survivor of the Tulsa race riot.Last survivor of Tulsa Race Riot passes away *Igor Korobov, 62, Russian intelligence officer, Director of the Main Intelligence Directorate (since 2016).Head of Russian military intelligence GRU Igor Korobov dies *Devin Lima, 41, American singer (LFO), adrenal cancer.LFO's Devin Lima Dies at 41: Report *M. I. Shanavas, 67, Indian politician, MP (since 2009), complications from liver transplant. *Lau Nai-keung, 71, Hong Kong businessman and politician, member of the Chinese People's Political Consultative wrestler, Olympic champion (1976, 1980).На 67-м году жизни скончался Сослан Андиев *Baishnab Charan Parida, 77, Indian politician, MP (2010–2016), liver cancer. *Jose Peralta, 47, American politician, City, Swansea City), pancreatic cancer.Former Bristol Rovers and Swansea City star Kevin Austin dies aged 45 *Betty Bumpers, 93, American childhood immunizations activist, First Lady of Arkansas (1971–1975), complications from a broken hip and dementia.Former Arkansas first lady Betty Bumpers dies at 93 *Menahem Degani, 91, Israeli Olympic basketball player (1952).הלך לעולמו מנחם קורמן *Bujor Hălmăgeanu, 77, Romanian football player (Steaua București, national team) and manager (Dacia Unirea Brăila), respiratory failure.A decedat Bujor Hălmăgeanu, fost campion cu Steaua în 1968 *Mick McGeough, 62, Canadian ice hockey referee (NFL), stroke.Regina's Mick McGeough, long-time hockey referee, dies at 62 *Bob McNair, 81, American businessman, owner of the Houston Texans, skin cancer.Houston Texans owner Bob McNair dies at age 81 *Nicolas Roeg, 90, English movie director (Don't Look Now, The Man Who Fell to Earth, The Witches) and cinematographer (A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum).Director Nicolas Roeg dies aged 90 *George Ty, 86, Filipino banker, founder of Metrobank, pancreatic cancer.George Ty dies ‘surrounded by loved ones and family’ *Gerard Unger, *Gordon Copeland, 75, New Zealand politician, MP (2002–2008), cancer.Gordon Copeland *David Defiagbon, 48, Nigerian-Canadian boxer, Olympic silver medalist (1996), heart attack.Former Olympic boxer David Defiagbon dead at 48 *Ricky Jay, 72, American stage magician and actor (Tomorrow Never Dies, Magnolia, Deadwood).Ricky Jay, Master Magician and Actor in ‘Deadwood,’ ‘Boogie Nights,’ Dies at 72 *Věra Růžičková, 90, Czech gymnast, Olympic champion (1948), breast cancer.Zemřela olympijská vítězka v gymnastice z Londýna 1948 Růžičková ===25=== *Randolph L. Braham *Giuliana Calandra, 82, Italian actress (La Calandria, Deep Red, L'affittacamere), leukemia.Morta Giuliana Calandra, attrice di Argento e Ferreri *Viktor Kanevskyi, 82, Ukrainian football player (Soviet national team, Dynamo Kyiv) and coach (Metalist Kharkiv, Dnipro), brain cancer.Умер легендарный украинский футболист - звезда киевского "Динамо" *Wright King, 95, American actor (A Streetcar Named Desire, Stagecoach to Fury, Planet of the Apes). *Willie Naulls, 84, American basketball player (New York Knicks, Golden State Warriors, Boston Celtics), respiratory failure.Willie Naulls has passed away. He was the first African-American to be named captain of a major professional sports team *C. K. Jaffer Sharief, 85, Indian politician, MP (1971–1996, 1998–2004) and Minister of Railways (1991–1995), heart attack.Senior Congress leader CK Jaffer Sharief dies at 85 ===26=== *Bernardo Bertolucci, 77, Italian movie director (Last Tango in Paris, The Last Emperor, 1900), Oscar winner (1988), lung cancer.Bernardo Bertolucci, Oscar-Winning Director of ‘The Last Emperor,’ Dies *Umberto Borsò, 95, Italian opera singer.Il tenore Umberto Borsò è morto a 95 anni: calcò i palchi di tutto il mondo *Stephen Hillenburg, 57, American cartoonist, creator of SpongeBob SquarePants, heart failure complicated by ALS.‘SpongeBob Squarepants’ Creator Stephen Hillenburg Dies at 57 *Sir Charles Huxtable, 87, British military officer, Commander-in-Chief, Land Forces (1988–1990). *Tomás Maldonado, 96, Argentine painter and designer, complications from pneumonia.Tomás Maldonado y su Arte Concreto : "Éramos jóvenes insoportables" *Patricia Quintana, 72, Mexican chef and writer, aortic aneurysm.Fallece la chef mexicana Patricia Quintana *Leo Schwarz, 87, German Roman Catholic prelate, Bishop of Abbir Germaniciana (since 1982), lymphoma.Unermüdlicher Anwalt für die Armen und Kleinen weltweit ===27=== *Harold O. Levy, 65, American lawyer and philanthropist, New York City School Chancellor (2000–2002), complications from ALS.Harold O. Levy, Progressive New York City Schools Chief, Dies at 65 *Ed Pastor, 75, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Arizona's 2nd, 4th, and 7th congressional districts (1991–2015), heart attack.Former Rep. Ed Pastor, who served 23 years in Congress, dead at 75 *V. K. Rao, 104, Indian civil servant, Principal Secretary to the President (1981–1982). *Barbara Brooks Wallace, 95, American writer (Peppermints in the Parlor, The Twin in the Tavern, Claudia), complications from pneumonia.Barbara Brooks Wallace, author of ‘Peppermints in the Parlor,’ dies at age 95 ===28=== *Richard Fulton, 91, American politician, member of the U.S. House of Representatives from Tennessee's 5th congressional district (1963–1975) and Mayor of Nashville (1975–1987).Richard Fulton, former Nashville mayor and congressman, dies at 91 *Robert Morris, 87, American sculptor, pneumonia.Robert Morris, Cornerstone of Postwar Art, Dies at 87 *Harry Leslie Smith, 95, British writer and political commentator, pneumonia complicated by a fall.Harry Leslie Smith, vocal critic of austerity, dies aged 95 ===29=== *Altaf Fatima, 91, Pakistani writer (Dastak Na Do), stroke.معروف ناول لگار،ادیبہ الطاف فاطمہ انتقال کر گئیں الطاف فاطمہ 91 سال کی عمر میں طویل علالت کے بعد خالق حقیقی سے جاملی *Eldon George, 87, Canadian fossil hunter and geologist.Eldon George (1931-2018) *Ruth Haring, 63, American chess player.WIM Ruth Haring, 1955-2018 *Viktor Matviyenko, 70, Ukrainian football player (Dynamo Kyiv, USSR national team) and manager (Torpedo Zaporizhya), Olympic bronze medalist (1976).Не стало Виктора Матвиенко... ===30=== *George H. W. Bush, 94, American politician, President (1989–1993), Vice President (1981–1989) and Director of Central Intelligence (1976–1977), complications from Parkinson's disease.George H.W. Bush, 41st president of the United States, dies at 94 *Luigi Farace, 84, Italian politician, Deputy (1987–1994) and Mayor of Bari (1978–1981).È morto a Bari Luigi Farace. title: Deaths in November 2018
